persistence-unit.name: simple-contacts
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT READ ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE contact.owner = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)
GRANT READ ACCESS TO User user WHERE user = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO User user WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

GRANT ACCESS TO User user WHERE user.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO User user WHERE 'ROLE_ADMIN' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: with-clause
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO MethodAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' in (CURRENT_ROLES)

GRANT ACCESS TO MethodAccessAnnotationTestBean b WHERE EXISTS (SELECT bean FROM MethodAccessAnnotationTestBean bean JOIN bean.parent parent WITH parent.name = 'user2' WHERE b = bean AND bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL)

persistence-unit.name: acl-model
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO AbstractAclProtectedEntity bean WHERE (bean.trademarkId is null OR bean.trademarkId = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT entry FROM Acl acl JOIN acl.entries entry WHERE acl = bean.accessControlList AND ( (entry.group is null AND EXISTS (SELECT user FROM User user JOIN user.roles role JOIN role.privileges privilege WHERE privilege = entry.privilege AND user.id IN (CURRENT_ROLES))) OR (entry.privilege is null AND EXISTS (SELECT user2 FROM User user2 JOIN user2.groups group2 WHERE group2 = entry.group AND user2.id IN (CURRENT_ROLES))) OR (EXISTS (SELECT user3 FROM User user3 JOIN user3.groups groups3 WHERE groups3 = entry.group AND user3.id IN (CURRENT_ROLES)) AND EXISTS (SELECT user FROM User user JOIN user.roles role JOIN role.privileges privilege WHERE privilege = entry.privilege AND user.id IN (CURRENT_ROLES))) ) ) OR bean.accessControlList is null)

persistence-unit.name: alias
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO Contact contact WHERE contact.owner.name = 'user'

persistence-unit.name: interface
